channel.title: You always wanted to kill macros
channel.description:
I was down at the Rimmy yews when someone showed me this. Ok, alot of bots are programmed to pick up yews on the ground right? Make a trail of yews (5 or 10 spaces apart) to the hobgoblins (or other monster if u arent at rimmy) and the macros will be killed (lvl3s or so). Its funny and it will get rid of annoying macros.
sry if im in wrong section or has already been posted.
* dont edit your bots to avoid this ;)
